definition: to be critically ill/to be terminally ill

sentences.english: The letter says that her mother is seriously ill.
He is known to have provided bedside care for his older brother during a period of critical illness.

sentences.english: She was recalled home when her father was critically ill。
sentences.chinese: 她的父亲病危才把她叫回家来。

sentences.english: Qin Hui critically ill, the emperor personally to visit.
sentences.chinese: 秦桧病危后，高宗曾亲自前往探望。

sentences.english: As reported by China, 18 patients are critically ill.
sentences.chinese: 根据中国报告，18名病人病危。

sentences.english: Elisha still served the nation at his old age.
sentences.chinese: 以利沙在年老病危中仍然为国效劳。

sentences.english: I was told that my aunt Peggotty was as right as rain now though she had been dying Last month.
sentences.chinese: 我听说我姨妈佩格蒂虽然上个月病危，但现在全好了。
